snippet: Known for defying political correctness, the state land commissioner, Jerry Patterson, is seeking to fill bigger boots in the lieutenant governor’s office.
abstract: Texas land commissioner Jerry Patterson remains true to the state's tradition of defiantly individualist politicians, even as many of his colleagues have begun adopting politically correct language and carefully polished media personae; Patterson is running as an underdog in the 2014 election for lieutenant governor, amid stiff competition from his fellow Republicans.
lead_paragraph: Known for defying political correctness, the state land commissioner, Jerry Patterson, is seeking to fill bigger boots in the lieutenant governor’s office.

headline.seo: Candidate Jerry Patterson Kicks a Spur Into Texas Politics
headline.main: Old-Time Texas Politician, Verbally Quick on the Draw
headline.print_headline: Old-Time Texas Politician, Verbally Quick on the Draw
